header.title: Front Page News Syndication
header.description: Allows you to easily pull threads from a forum to display on another page as news articles. An example would be like at phpBB.com except this also pulls the text of the post (however you can use whatever part of it as you wish).
header.author-notes: Existing experience with PHP will make customisation easier, though not required!

changelog.change: Changed the default way posts are outputted to not require CSS to move the post information below the topic title. Also, lets call this final.

action-group.diy-instructions:
Open news.php and look for the 4 customisable options at the top of the script.
Most importantly is the path to you forums and the ID of the forum to syndicate posts from.
